Over time, it is very tedious to change the flash memory, so I developed a tube that can transfer the support points between machines.
It is a normal tube supplemented with a Glowtite sheath, which can allow transmission of support points.
These pipes are particularly practical to provide machines with support points.

Settings: Using the Scrench, I can change the sides of the pipe so that they no longer connect with other pipes and inventories. (In addition, there is a third mode, which is controlled by a spot on the corresponding page. In this mode, only the Support points are transferred (also to machinery), but items are not.
